contentList.content: Blade of Evils Bane.
Master Sword
Sacred Luster
Melee weapon attacks deal an additional [1], doubled against Fiends, Undead, Aberrations, or Monstrosities.
Blade of Evil's Bane
Blade of Evil's Bane
Skyward Strike

Holding your weapon aloft, you send a blade of energy at your target.

This attack deals [1] at a target within [2].
Slumbering Sentience

The passive intelligence of the sword provides greater awareness. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Perception and Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is doubled for Perception and Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Slumbering Sentience's Sight
The bearer can see in the dark up to [1] and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
Sacred Luster

Your attacks are suffused with divine might.

Melee weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
Goddess Sword
Forged and wielded by the goddess Hylia in a long-forgotten age.
The passive intelligence of the sword provides greater awareness. You have a +[1] bonus to Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
The bearer can see in the dark up to [1].

The passive intelligence of the sword provides greater awareness. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> for Perception and Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Goddess Longsword
An improved sword once wielded by the goddess Hylia.

The passive intelligence of the sword provides greater awareness. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency</LSTag> on Perception and Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Goddess White Sword
A sword blessed by ancient goddesses and believed to be inhabited by a sleeping spirit.
Farore's Emerald
Holding this gem emboldens your courage.
Holding this gem strenghens your wisdom.
Din's Ruby
Holding this gem fills you with surges of power.
Nayru's Sapphire
